member.name: T:IntXLib.DigitConverter
member.summary: Converts digits to/from byte array.

member.name: M:IntXLib.DigitConverter.ToBytes(System.UInt32[])
member.summary: Converts big integer digits to bytes.
member.remarks: Digits can be obtained using method.

member.name: M:IntXLib.DigitConverter.FromBytes(System.Byte[])

member.remarks: Big integer can be created from digits using constructor.

member.summary: Divides two big integers. Also modifies and (it will contain remainder).
member.param: Buffer for first big integer digits. May also contain remainder. Can be null - in this case it's created if necessary.
Buffer for second big integer digits. Only temporarily used. Can be null - in this case it's created if necessary.
Big integers comparsion result (pass -2 if omitted).

member.name: T:IntXLib.NewtonHelper
member.summary: Contains helping methods for fast division using Newton approximation approach and fast multiplication.

member.name: M:IntXLib.NewtonHelper.GetIntegerOpposite(System.UInt32*,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32*,System.UInt32@,System.UInt64@)
member.summary: Generates integer opposite to the given one using approximation. Uses algorithm from Khuth vol. 2 3rd Edition (4.3.3).
member.param: Buffer in which shifted big integer may be stored.
How much resulting big integer is shifted to the left (or: must be shifted to the right).

member.name: T:IntXLib.Bits
member.summary: Contains helping methods to with with bits in dword ().

member.name: M:IntXLib.Bits.Nlz(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns number of leading zero bits in int.

member.name: M:IntXLib.Bits.Msb(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Counts position of the most significant bit in int. Can also be used as Floor(Log2()).
member.returns: Position of the most significant one bit (-1 if all zeroes).

member.name: M:IntXLib.Bits.CeilLog2(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Ceil(Log2()).

member.name: T:IntXLib.IntX
member.summary: Numeric class which represents arbitrary-precision integers.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor
member.summary: Creates new big integer with zero value.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates new big integer from integer value.
member.param: Integer value to create big integer from.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Creates new big integer from unsigned integer value.
member.param: Unsigned integer value to create big integer from.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor(System.Int64)
member.summary: Creates new big integer from long value.
member.param: Long value to create big integer from.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Creates new big integer from unsigned long value.
member.param: Unsigned long value to create big integer from.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor(System.UInt32[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates new big integer from array of it's "digits". Digit with lower index has less weight.
member.param: True if this number is negative.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates new from string.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor(System.String,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Creates new from string.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor(IntXLib.IntX)
member.summary: Copy constructor.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor(System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Creates new empty big integer with desired sign and length.
For internal use.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.#ctor(System.UInt32[],System.Boolean,System.UInt32)
member.summary:
Creates new big integer from array of it's "digits" but with given length. Digit with lower index has less weight.
For internal use.
member.param: True if this number is negative.
Length to use for internal digits array.

member.summary: Returns string representation of this object in given base.
member.param: Base of system in which to do output.
Use uppercase for bases from 11 to 16 (which use letters A-F).

member.summary: Returns string representation of this object in given base using custom alphabet.
member.param: Base of system in which to do output.
Alphabet which contains chars used to represent big integer, char position is coresponding digit value.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntX.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses provided string representation of object in decimal base. If number starts from "0" then it's treated as octal; if number starts fropm "0x" then it's treated as hexadecimal.

member.name: T:IntXLib.IntXGlobalSettings
member.summary: global settings.

member.name: P:IntXLib.IntXGlobalSettings.MultiplyMode
member.summary: Multiply operation mode used in all instances. Set to auto-FHT by default.

member.name: P:IntXLib.IntXGlobalSettings.DivideMode
member.summary: Divide operation mode used in all instances. Set to auto-Newton by default.

member.name: P:IntXLib.IntXGlobalSettings.ParseMode
member.summary: Parse mode used in all instances. Set to Fast by default.

member.name: P:IntXLib.IntXGlobalSettings.ToStringMode
member.summary: To string conversion mode used in all instances. Set to Fast by default.

member.name: P:IntXLib.IntXGlobalSettings.AutoNormalize
member.summary: If true then each operation is ended with big integer normalization. Set to false by default.

member.name: P:IntXLib.IntXGlobalSettings.ApplyFhtValidityCheck
member.summary: If true then FHT multiplication result is always checked for validity by multiplying integers lower digits using classic algorithm and comparing with FHT result. Set to true by default.

member.summary: instance settings.

member.name: M:IntXLib.IntXSettings.#ctor(IntXLib.IntXGlobalSettings)
member.summary: Creates new instance.

member.summary: To string conversion mode used in this instance. Set to value from by default.

member.name: P:IntXLib.IntXSettings.AutoNormalize
member.summary: If true then each operation is ended with big integer normalization. Set to value from by default.

member.name: T:IntXLib.Constants
member.summary: Constants used in and helping classes.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.DigitOpeningBracet
member.summary: Digit opening bracet (used for bases bigger then 16).

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.DigitClosingBracet
member.summary: Digit closing bracet (used for bases bigger then 16).

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.DigitsMinusChar
member.summary: Minus char (-).

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.MinPooledArraySizeLog2
member.summary: Minimal Log2(array length) which will be pooled using any array pool.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.MaxPooledArraySizeLog2
member.summary: Maximal Log2(array length) which will be pooled using any array pool.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.MaxArrayPoolCount
member.summary: Maximal allowed array pool items count in each stack.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.AutoFhtLengthLowerBound
member.summary: length from which FHT is used (in auto-FHT mode). Before this length usual multiply algorithm works faster.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.AutoFhtLengthUpperBound
member.summary: length 'till which FHT is used (in auto-FHT mode). After this length using of FHT may be unsafe due to big precision errors.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.FhtValidityCheckDigitCount
member.summary: Number of lower digits used to check FHT multiplication result validity.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.AutoNewtonLengthLowerBound
member.summary: length from which Newton approach is used (in auto-Newton mode). Before this length usual divide algorithm works faster.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.AutoNewtonLengthUpperBound
member.summary: length 'till which Newton approach is used (in auto-Newton mode). After this length using of fast division may be slow.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.FastParseLengthLowerBound
member.summary: length from which fast parsing is used (in Fast parsing mode). Before this length usual parsing algorithm works faster.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.FastParseLengthUpperBound
member.summary: length 'till which fast parsing is used (in Fast parsing mode). After this length using of parsing will be slow.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.FastConvertLengthLowerBound
member.summary: length from which fast convertion is used (in Fast convert mode). Before this length usual convertion algorithm works faster.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.FastConvertLengthUpperBound
member.summary: length 'till which fast convertion is used (in Fast convert mode). After this length using of convertion will be slow.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.DigitBitCount
member.summary: Count of bits in one digit.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.MaxBitCount
member.summary: Maximum count of bits which can fit in .

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.BaseUpperChars
member.summary: Chars used to parse/output big integers (upper case).

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.BaseLowerChars
member.summary: Chars used to parse/output big integers (lower case).

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.BaseCharToDigits
member.summary: Standard char->digit dictionary.

member.name: F:IntXLib.Constants.DigitBaseLog
member.summary: Natural logarithm of digits base (log(2^32)).

member.summary: Used when FHT multiplication result is incorrect.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: A message that describes the error.

member.name: T:IntXLib.DivModResultFlags
member.summary: divide results to return.

member.name: F:IntXLib.DivModResultFlags.Div
member.summary: Divident is returned.

member.name: F:IntXLib.DivModResultFlags.Mod
member.summary: Remainder is returned.

member.name: T:IntXLib.MultiplyMode
member.summary: Big integers multiply mode used in .

member.name: F:IntXLib.MultiplyMode.AutoFht
member.summary: FHT (Fast Hartley Transform) is used for really big integers. Time estimate is O(n * log n). Default mode.

member.name: F:IntXLib.MultiplyMode.Classic
member.summary: Classic method is used. Time estimate is O(n ^ 2).

member.name: T:IntXLib.DivideMode
member.summary: Big integers divide mode used in .

member.name: F:IntXLib.DivideMode.AutoNewton
member.summary: Newton approximation algorithm is used for really big integers. Time estimate is same as for multiplication. Default mode.

member.name: F:IntXLib.DivideMode.Classic
member.summary: Classic method is used. Time estimate is O(n ^ 2).

member.name: T:IntXLib.ParseMode
member.summary: Big integers parsing mode used in .

member.name: F:IntXLib.ParseMode.Fast
member.summary: Fast method which uses divide-by-two approach and fast multiply to parse numbers. Time estimate is O(n * [log n]^2). Default mode.

member.name: F:IntXLib.ParseMode.Classic
member.summary: Classic method is used (using multiplication). Time estimate is O(n ^ 2).

member.name: T:IntXLib.ToStringMode
member.summary: Big integers to string conversion mode used in .

member.name: F:IntXLib.ToStringMode.Fast
member.summary: Fast method which uses divide-by-two approach to convert numbers. Default mode.

member.name: F:IntXLib.ToStringMode.Classic
member.summary: Classic method is used (using division). Time estimate is O(n ^ 2).

member.name: P:IntXLib.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
